list.title: 下载用户模板
list.desc:
请求样例：

URL  - /apollo/user/downloadTemplate

请求方法 - GET

Headers - Content-Type=application/json

返回体 -

字节流 浏览器会直接下载

用户模板 -
http://wiki.devdemo.trs.net.cn/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=16909215&preview=/16909215/16915163/user_template.xlsx
list.markdown: 请求样例： URL  - /apollo/user/downloadTemplate 请求方法 - GET Headers - Content-Type=application/json 返回体 - ``` 字节流 浏览器会直接下载 ``` 用户模板 - [http://wiki.devdemo.trs.net.cn/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=16909215&preview=/16909215/16915163/](http://wiki.devdemo.trs.net.cn/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=16909215&preview=/16909215/16915163/%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E5%AF%BC%E5%85%A5%E6%A8%A1%E6%9D%BF.xlsx)user_template.xlsx

list.title: 修改当前用户密码
list.desc:
请求样例：
URL  -  /apollo/user/resetMyPassword

请求方法 - POST
Headers - Content-Type=application/json
               - X-User-Token=xxxxx

请求体 -

{
 "newPassword": "xxxx",
 "originPassword": "xxx"
}

返回体 -


{
 "resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "密码修改成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
 "result": {
   "totalCount": 0,
   "pageSize": 0,
 "data": [{
   }]
 }
}

resultCode枚举 -

"resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "密码修改成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
   {
   "code": "00001",
   "cnMsg": "",
   "enMsg": ""
   },
   {
   "code": "09999",
   "cnMsg": "系统内部错误",
   "enMsg": "system error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09998",
   "cnMsg": "网络异常",
   "enMsg": "network error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09997",
   "cnMsg": "参数错误",
   "enMsg": "params error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09996",
   "cnMsg": "操作失败",
   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"resultCode":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"返回码","mock":{"mock":"00000"}},"cnMsg":{"type":"string","description":"中文消息","mock":{"mock":"密码修改成功"}},"enMsg":{"type":"string","description":"英文消息","mock":{"mock":"success"}}},"required":["code","cnMsg","enMsg"],"description":"返回码"},"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalCount":{"type":"integer","description":"总数 可忽略","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"pageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"每页数据大小 可忽略","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{},"required":[]},"description":"返回数据"}},"required":["totalCount","pageSize","data"]}},"required":["resultCode","result"]}

list.title: 分页查询用户 按插入时间倒序返回

req_query.name: status
req_query.desc: 用户状态 0-启用 1-停用 -1 - 全部

req_query.name: createTime
req_query.desc: 1-近一天 2-近一周 3-近一月 4-自定义 -1 - 全部

req_query.name: beginTime
req_query.desc: 开始时间 时间戳 非必须 用户选择自定义时间段时带上此参数

req_query.name: endTime
req_query.desc: 结束时间 时间戳 非必须 用户选择自定义时间段时带上此参数 不得小于等于开始时间

req_query.name: queryText
req_query.desc: 真实姓名/手机号/邮箱 这三个字段都放在这里 非必须 后台模糊查询

list.desc:
请求样例：

URL  - /apollo/user/getUserByPage

请求方法 - GET

Headers - Content-Type=application/json
              - X-User-Token=xxxx

Query参数 -
pageNo=1
pageSize=10
status=0
createTime=0
beginTime=2020-1-1 10:10:10
endTime=2020-1-1 10:10:13
queryText=zhangsan

返回体 -

{
 "resultCode": {
  "code": "00000",
  "cnMsg": "成功",
  "enMsg": "success"
 },
 "result": {
  "totalCount": 1,
  "pageSize": 1,
  "data": [{
    "tel": "13800138000",
    "realName": "zhangsan",
    "id": 1,
    "email": "11@qq.com",
    "role": 1,
    "status": 1,
    "createTime": "2020-1-1 10:10:10"
  }]
 }
}

resultCode枚举 -

"resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
   {
   "code": "00001",
   "cnMsg": "",
   "enMsg": ""
   },
   {
   "code": "09999",
   "cnMsg": "系统内部错误",
   "enMsg": "system error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09998",
   "cnMsg": "网络异常",
   "enMsg": "network error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09997",
   "cnMsg": "参数错误",
   "enMsg": "params error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09996",
   "cnMsg": "操作失败",
   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }
list.markdown: 请求样例： URL  - /apollo/user/getUserByPage 请求方法 - GET Headers - Content-Type=application/json               - X-User-Token=xxxx Query参数 - pageNo=1 pageSize=10 status=0 createTime=0 beginTime=2020-1-1 10:10:10 endTime=2020-1-1 10:10:13 queryText=zhangsan 返回体 - ``` json { "resultCode": { "code": "00000", "cnMsg": "成功", "enMsg": "success" }, "result": { "totalCount": 1, "pageSize": 1, "data": [{ "tel": "13800138000", "realName": "zhangsan", "id": 1, "email": "11@qq.com", "role": 1, "status": 1, "createTime": "2020-1-1 10:10:10" }] } } ``` resultCode枚举 - ``` json "resultCode": { "code": "00000", "cnMsg": "成功", "enMsg": "success" }, { "code": "00001", "cnMsg": "", "enMsg": "" }, { "code": "09999", "cnMsg": "系统内部错误", "enMsg": "system error" }, { "code": "09998", "cnMsg": "网络异常", "enMsg": "network error" }, { "code": "09997", "cnMsg": "参数错误", "enMsg": "params error" }, { "code": "09996", "cnMsg": "操作失败", "enMsg": "operate fail" } ```
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"resultCode":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"返回码","mock":{"mock":"00000"}},"cnMsg":{"type":"string","description":"中文消息","mock":{"mock":"成功"}},"enMsg":{"type":"string","description":"英文消息","mock":{"mock":"success"}}},"required":["code","cnMsg","enMsg"]},"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalCount":{"type":"integer","description":"总数","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"pageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"每页数据数量","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"tel":{"type":"string","description":"电话","mock":{"mock":"13800138000"}},"realName":{"type":"string","description":"真实姓名","mock":{"mock":"name"}},"id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"email":{"type":"string","description":"邮箱","mock":{"mock":"1@qq.com"}},"role":{"type":"integer","description":"角色权限 0代表普通用户，1代表应用管理员，2代表运维，3代表管理员","mock":{"mock":"1"}},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"用户状态 0-启用 1-停用","mock":{"mock":"0"}},"createTime":{"type":"string","description":"时间戳 2020-1-1 10:10:10","mock":{"mock":"2020-1-1 10:10:10"}}},"required":["tel","realName","id","email","role","status","createTime"]},"description":"返回数据"}},"required":["totalCount","pageSize","data"]}},"required":["resultCode","result"]}

list.title: 导入用户模板

req_body_form.name: upfile
req_body_form.desc: 用户模板 仅支持xls xls格式

list.desc:
请求样例：

URL  - /apollo/user/addByTemplate

请求方法 - POST

Headers - Content-Type=multipart/form-data
              - X-User-Token=xxxx

请求体 - 用户模板文件
http://wiki.devdemo.trs.net.cn/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=16909215&preview=/16909215/16915163/用户导入模板.xlsx

返回体 -

{
 "resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "导入成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
 },
 "result": {
  "totalCount": 0,
  "pageSize": 0,
  "data": []
	}
}

resultCode枚举 -

"resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "导入成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
   {
   "code": "00001",
   "cnMsg": "",
   "enMsg": ""
   },
   {
   "code": "09999",
   "cnMsg": "系统内部错误",
   "enMsg": "system error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09998",
   "cnMsg": "网络异常",
   "enMsg": "network error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09997",
   "cnMsg": "参数错误 导入失败",
   "enMsg": "params error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09996",
   "cnMsg": "导入失败",
   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }

list.title: 新增普通用户-查询应用列表
list.desc:
请求样例：

URL  - /apollo/user/getAppList

请求方法 - GET

Headers - Content-Type=application/json
                 X-User-Token=xxxxx

返回体 -

{
 "resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "登录成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
 "result": {
   "totalCount": 0,
   "pageSize": 0,
 "data": [
      {
        "appName": "123",
        "appId": 1
      },
      {
        "appName": "321",
        "appId": 2
      }
    ]
 }
}

resultCode枚举 -

"resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
   {
   "code": "00001",
   "cnMsg": "",
   "enMsg": ""
   },
   {
   "code": "09999",
   "cnMsg": "系统内部错误",
   "enMsg": "system error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09998",
   "cnMsg": "网络异常",
   "enMsg": "network error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09997",
   "cnMsg": "手机号和（或）密码错误",
   "enMsg": "params error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09996",
   "cnMsg": "登录失败",
   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }

list.title: 新增用户

URL  - /apollo/user/addUser

请求方法 - POST

Headers - Content-Type=application/json
               - X-User-Token=xxxxx

请求体 -

{
	"email": "12324@qq.com",
	"realName": "管理员",
	"role": 1,
	"tel": "1522147770",
	"appAuth": [1,2]
}

返回体 -

list.title: 查询单个用户详情
list.desc:
请求样例：
URL  - /apollo/user/getOneDetail
请求方法 - GET
Headers - Content-Type=application/json
               - X-User-Token=xxxxx

返回体 -

{
 "resultCode": {
  "code": "00000",
  "cnMsg": "成功",
  "enMsg": "success"
 },
  "result": {
   "totalCount": 0,
   "pageSize": 0,
  "data": [{
   "tel": "dfsfsfds",
   "realName": "zhangsan",
   "email": "11@qq.com",
   "role": 1,
   "id": 1,
   "appAuth": [1,2]
   }]
 }
}

resultCode枚举 -

"resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "成功",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
   {
   "code": "00001",
   "cnMsg": "",
   "enMsg": ""
   },
   {
   "code": "09999",
   "cnMsg": "系统内部错误",
   "enMsg": "system error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09998",
   "cnMsg": "网络异常",
   "enMsg": "network error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09997",
   "cnMsg": "参数错误",
   "enMsg": "params error"
   },
   {
   "code": "09996",
   "cnMsg": "操作失败",
   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }

list.title: 校验手机号全局唯一
list.desc:
请求样例：

URL  - /apollo/user/verifyTel

请求方法 - POST

Headers - Content-Type=application/json
               - X-User-Token=xxxxx

请求体 -

{
 "tel": "13800138000"
}

返回体 -


{
 "resultCode": {
   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "手机号无冲突",
   "enMsg": "success"
   },
 "result": {
   "totalCount": 0,
   "pageSize": 0,
 "data": [{
   }
]
 }
}

resultCode枚举 -

   "code": "00000",
   "cnMsg": "手机号无冲突",

   },

   "enMsg": "operate fail"
   }

list.markdown: 请求样例： URL  - /apollo/user/verifyEmail 请求方法 - POST Headers - Content-Type=application/json                - X-User-Token=xxxxx 请求体 - ``` json { "email": "123@qq.com", "id":12 } ``` 返回体 - ``` json { "resultCode": { "code": "00000", "cnMsg": "邮箱无冲突", "enMsg": "success" }, "result": { "totalCount": 0, "pageSize": 0, "data": [{ } ] } } ``` resultCode枚举 - ``` json "resultCode": { "code": "00000", "cnMsg": "邮箱无冲突", "enMsg": "success" }, { "code": "00001", "cnMsg": "", "enMsg": "" }, { "code": "09999", "cnMsg": "系统内部错误", "enMsg": "system error" }, { "code": "09998", "cnMsg": "网络异常", "enMsg": "network error" }, { "code": "09997", "cnMsg": "参数错误 新增失败", "enMsg": "params error" }, { "code": "09996", "cnMsg": "新增失败", "enMsg": "operate fail" } ```

}

   "code": "00000",

   "enMsg": "success"
   },

   "pageSize": 0,
 "data": [{
   "token": "xxx",
   "role":1,
   "userId":1
   }]
 }
}

   "code": "000000",
   "cnMsg": "登录成功",
